shipping_and_delivery.question: How do I track my order status?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Track orders in the app: My Account > My Orders > select the order > Order Tracker for step-by-step status and expected delivery date.

shipping_and_delivery.question: How long will it take for my order to arrive?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Orders typically take about 15 days from placement to delivery. You can follow progress anytime in My Orders.

shipping_and_delivery.question: How long does shipping take?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Most orders are completed and delivered within ~15 days. Times can vary during peak periods.

shipping_and_delivery.question: What shipping methods do you offer?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Orders are processed in a queue and delivered by our courier partners. Exact method varies by destination; details appear at checkout.

shipping_and_delivery.question: Do you offer express or expedited shipping options?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Expedited/scheduled delivery isn’t supported at this time.

shipping_and_delivery.question: What are your shipping rates?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Rates are shown at checkout and may vary by address, order size/weight, and current courier fees.

shipping_and_delivery.question: What's the difference between standard shipping and expedited shipping?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: We currently do not offer expedited shipping; orders are fulfilled in queue and typically delivered within ~15 days.

shipping_and_delivery.question: Do you offer international shipping?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Currently we deliver across Egypt only.

shipping_and_delivery.question: Are there any shipping restrictions for certain products?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Some items may face carrier constraints. Any limits or special handling notes appear on the product page or at checkout.

shipping_and_delivery.question: Is there a tracking number for my order?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Yes—tracking is available in My Orders and may also be shared by email/SMS when shipped.

shipping_and_delivery.question: How can I track my order?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Log into your account and open My Orders to view live status and tracking details.

shipping_and_delivery.question: How do I track my order's shipping progress?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Use the Order Tracker in the app or the tracking link sent via email/SMS when available.

shipping_and_delivery.question: Do you offer shipping updates via email or SMS?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Yes. Opt in during checkout or in your account preferences to receive status notifications.

shipping_and_delivery.question: Can I specify a delivery date or time for my order?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Exact delivery scheduling isn’t available. Orders are fulfilled in a queue; printing begins when it’s your turn.

shipping_and_delivery.question: What happens if my package gets lost or damaged during shipping?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Contact support with your order number. We’ll investigate with the carrier and assist with replacement or refund per policy.

shipping_and_delivery.question: What should I do if my order hasn't arrived within the expected timeframe?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Check tracking first. If overdue or without updates, contact support and we’ll help right away.

shipping_and_delivery.question: Are there any delays expected during holidays or peak seasons?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Yes—delays can occur during holidays and peak demand.

shipping_and_delivery.question: What is your return policy for items that arrive late or damaged?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Late/damaged items are handled under our standard returns/claims policy. Contact support with details and photos.

shipping_and_delivery.question: Can I change my shipping address after placing the order?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Address changes may be possible before shipment. Contact support as soon as possible.

shipping_and_delivery.question: Can I reroute my package to a different address if I'm not available to receive it?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Rerouting depends on carrier and status; fees may apply.

shipping_and_delivery.question: What happens if I miss the delivery attempt?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Carriers typically attempt redelivery or provide pickup instructions on the tracking page or delivery notice.

shipping_and_delivery.question: Can I combine multiple orders to save on shipping costs?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: We may be able to combine orders placed close together—contact support promptly.

shipping_and_delivery.question: Do you provide free shipping on orders over a certain amount?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Free shipping may be offered during promotions. See current details at checkout or on promo pages.

shipping_and_delivery.question: Do you offer local pickup as an option?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Local pickup may be available in select areas; if eligible, it will appear at checkout.

shipping_and_delivery.question: Do you offer signature confirmation upon delivery?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Signature service may be available for high-value orders or on request; additional fees may apply.

shipping_and_delivery.question: Is there a shipping cut-off time for same-day dispatch?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Same-day dispatch isn’t applicable to made-to-order 3D prints. Production begins in queue after order placement.

shipping_and_delivery.question: What delivery areas do you cover?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: We deliver across all of Egypt, covering major cities and smaller towns.

product_information.question: What are the key features of this product?
product_information.answer: Key features are listed on the product page under 'Features' or 'Details'.

product_information.question: How does this product work?
product_information.answer: Refer to the product description and any included guide for usage steps.

product_information.question: What materials is this product made from?
product_information.answer: Materials are specified in the product specifications section.

product_information.question: What are the dimensions and weight of the product?
product_information.answer: Dimensions/weight are shown on the product page under 'Specifications'.

product_information.question: Is this product available in different sizes/colors/variants?
product_information.answer: Yes—available variants appear as options on the product page.

product_information.question: How do I use this product?
product_information.answer: Follow the product page instructions and safety notes.

product_information.question: Is this product compatible with other devices/accessories?
product_information.answer: See compatibility notes on the product page; contact support if unsure.

product_information.question: Are there any specific care instructions for this product?
product_information.answer: Care/maintenance guidance is provided on the product page or in the box.

product_information.question: Can this product be used for indoor/outdoor purposes?
product_information.answer: Usage depends on the model; check specifications for environmental suitability.

product_information.question: Is this product suitable for beginners/advanced users?
product_information.answer: Suitability varies by product and user experience; see details on the product page.

product_information.question: Is this product currently in stock?
product_information.answer: Stock status appears on the product page and at checkout.

product_information.question: Will this product be restocked in the future?
product_information.answer: Restocks depend on availability; use 'Notify me' to receive alerts.

product_information.question: How can I be notified when this product is back in stock?
product_information.answer: Click 'Notify me' on the product page to receive restock emails.

product_information.question: Are there any quantity limits for purchasing this product?
product_information.answer: Limits may apply due to demand or policy; any limits appear at checkout.

product_information.question: Can I pre-order this product?
product_information.answer: Pre-orders are offered on select items and will be labeled accordingly.

product_information.question: What is the price of this product?
product_information.answer: The current price is shown on the product page.

product_information.question: Do you offer any discounts or promotions on this product?
product_information.answer: Promotions are displayed on the product page or applied at checkout when eligible.

product_information.question: Are there bulk or wholesale pricing options available?
product_information.answer: Yes—contact sales/support with your requirements.

product_information.question: Do you price match with other retailers?
product_information.answer: We may price-match identical items per policy; share the competitor link with support.

product_information.question: How can I leave a product review?
product_information.answer: Open the product page and click 'Write a Review' to submit your feedback.

product_information.question: Can I request a product demonstration before making a purchase?
product_information.answer: We don’t offer live demos, but product pages include specs, photos, and reviews.

product_information.question: What does it mean for a product to be 3D printed?
product_information.answer: 3D printing builds objects layer by layer from a digital file, enabling complex shapes, customization, and on-demand manufacturing.

product_information.question: Are 3D printed products strong and durable?
product_information.answer: Yes—our products are printed with high-quality PLA suitable for everyday use.

product_information.question: What is the difference between customizable and generic 3D printed products?
product_information.answer: Customizable products let you add text/images before printing; generic products have fixed designs.

product_information.question: How do I know the product size and dimensions?
product_information.answer: Dimensions appear in cm (L × W × H) on each product page. Some pages include scale illustrations.

product_information.question: What materials are used in 3D printed items? Are they safe?
product_information.answer: We use PLA (biodegradable, non-toxic). It’s ideal for indoor use and not recommended for high-heat or food-contact applications.

product_information.question: Will the product look like the photo?
product_information.answer: Yes, with minor texture variations due to the 3D printing process.

product_information.question: Do 3D printed products break easily?
product_information.answer: No—when used as intended, PLA prints are durable.

product_information.question: Is it normal for a 3D printed item to have layer lines or texture?
product_information.answer: Yes—subtle layer lines are normal and part of the process.

product_information.question: Are 3D printed items made in Egypt?
product_information.answer: Yes—products are 3D printed at WandDo’s facilities in Egypt.

returns_and_exchanges.question: What is your return policy?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: You can return products within the policy window in original condition/packaging. See our Returns page for steps and exclusions.

returns_and_exchanges.question: What is your return and exchange policy?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Returns/exchanges are accepted within the stated window for eligible items per our policy.

returns_and_exchanges.question: How many days do I have to initiate a return or exchange?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Initiate within the window on our Returns page. Timing varies by item type.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Can I return or exchange a personalized/customized item?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Customized items may have limited return windows; see item-specific policy.

returns_and_exchanges.question: How do I initiate a return or exchange?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Start from your account’s Orders page or contact support for a return label/RMA if required.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Do I need to obtain a Return Authorization Number (RMA) before sending back an item?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Some returns require an RMA or provided label. Follow the instructions you receive.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Is there a specific form or procedure for returns and exchanges?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Follow the instructions on our Returns page; include any required forms/labels.

returns_and_exchanges.question: What condition should the item be in for a successful return or exchange?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Items should be unused, in original condition and packaging, with all accessories.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Can I return an item that has been opened/used?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Opened/used items may not be eligible unless defective; see policy.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Do I need to include all original packaging and accessories when returning an item?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Yes—include all original accessories, manuals, and packaging.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Can I return or exchange a damaged or defective item?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Yes—report it to support with photos so we can assist.

returns_and_exchanges.question: How long does it take to process a refund or exchange?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Processing typically takes 3–10 business days after the item is received and inspected.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Will I receive a full refund for the returned item?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Eligible returns are refunded to the original payment method minus any applicable fees.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Do I need to pay for shipping when sending back a return or exchange?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Responsibility depends on reason and policy; prepaid labels are provided for defective/incorrect items.

returns_and_exchanges.question: What should I do if I receive a damaged or defective item?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Contact support immediately with your order number and photos for quick assistance.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Do I need to provide photos or evidence of the damage when requesting a return or exchange?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Photos help us assess and speed up the claim.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Will I be reimbursed for shipping costs if I'm returning a damaged or defective item?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Yes—return shipping is typically covered for defective/incorrect items.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Can I return a product if I changed my mind?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Yes—within the allowed window and condition requirements.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Can I return a product if it was a final sale item?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Final-sale items are usually non-returnable and non-refundable.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Can I return a product if it was purchased during a sale or with a discount?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Refunds reflect the amount paid after discounts.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Can I return a product if it was purchased with a gift card?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Refunds for gift-card purchases are generally issued as store credit.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Can I return a product if I no longer have the original packaging?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Original packaging is required for most returns; contact support if unavailable.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Can I return a product if it was purchased as part of a bundle or set?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Bundle returns may require returning the full set; see policy.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Can I return a product if it was a clearance or final sale item?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Clearance/final sale items are typically not eligible for return.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Can I return a product if it was damaged due to improper use?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Damage from misuse isn’t covered; contact support to review options.

returns_and_exchanges.question: How do I request a return?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: In the app, go to Order History, select the item, and submit a return request with a photo. Keep original packaging for safe return.

returns_and_exchanges.question: What’s the return window for my product?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Generic 3D-printed items: 14 days. Custom-made 3D-printed items: 2 days. Products with electronics: 14 days if unopened/unused.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Who pays for the return shipping?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: WandDo covers shipping for one return request per order. Additional returns may require customer-paid shipping.

returns_and_exchanges.question: How long does it take to get a refund?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Once approved, refunds are processed within 5 business days. Bank reimbursements can take 7–14 days depending on your provider.

returns_and_exchanges.question: How will I receive my refund?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Refunds are issued via bank transfer or Paymob, up to a maximum of LE 300. COD refunds are issued as store credit.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Can I return a customized product?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Yes, but only within 2 days of delivery.

returns_and_exchanges.question: What if the returned item is incorrect or damaged?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: If the item is mismatched, used, or damaged during return, no refund will be issued and return shipping may be charged.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Do I need proof of shipment when returning?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Yes—retain proof of shipment until your return is confirmed and refund processed.

returns_and_exchanges.question: Can the return and refund policy change?
returns_and_exchanges.answer: Yes—our policy may be updated periodically; please review it regularly.

payments.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payments.answer: WandDo supports Cash on Delivery (COD), online payments through Paymob, and instalments via Valu on wanddo.shop.

payments.question: Is my payment information secure?
payments.answer: Yes—Paymob provides PCI DSS v4.0 compliance, 3-D Secure authentication, SSL/TLS encryption, and advanced fraud detection.

payments.question: Can I pay in instalments?
payments.answer: Instalments are available via Valu on wanddo.shop.

payments.question: Do you offer Cash on Delivery (COD)?
payments.answer: Yes—pay in cash upon delivery.

payments.question: What should I do if my payment fails?
payments.answer: Wait a few minutes and retry after checking card details, online payment enablement, funds, and internet connection. If it persists, try another method or contact your bank.

payments.question: Where can I find the receipt or invoice?
payments.answer: Go to My Orders > select the order > scroll to the bottom for full payment details and invoice.

payments.question: Can I use promo codes or coupons?
payments.answer: Yes—enter your coupon on the checkout screen before completing your purchase.

payments.question: How are refunds issued?
payments.answer: Refunds use the same payment method when possible. COD refunds are issued as store credit.

payments.question: Can I pay with a credit/debit card?
payments.answer: Yes—online card payments are supported via Paymob.

payments.question: Do you accept PayPal or other online payment platforms?
payments.answer: PayPal support varies by region and setup. If unavailable at checkout, please use Paymob card payments, COD, or Valu instalments.

payments.question: Can I pay with a gift card or store credit?
payments.answer: Eligible store credit can be applied at checkout when available.

payments.question: Can I use a prepaid card or virtual wallet for payment?
payments.answer: Prepaid cards/supported wallets may work if enabled for online transactions through our processor.

payments.question: Can I use mobile payment options like Apple Pay or Google Pay?
payments.answer: Mobile wallets may be available on compatible devices/browsers when supported by our processor.

payments.question: Are there any additional fees for certain payment methods?
payments.answer: We don’t add extra payment fees; your provider may charge its own fees.

payments.question: Can I set up automatic recurring payments?
payments.answer: Recurring billing may be available for eligible subscriptions/services when offered.

payments.question: Can I split my payment between multiple methods?
payments.answer: Split payments aren’t always supported online; contact support for options.

payments.question: Can I change my payment method after placing an order?
payments.answer: Changes are limited once an order is placed; contact support quickly.

payments.question: Can I save my payment information for future purchases?
payments.answer: Yes—save payment details securely in your account when offered.

payments.question: Are there any restrictions on payment methods for certain products or services?
payments.answer: Some items/services may restrict certain methods; see checkout for availability.

payments.question: Do you offer any discounts or promotions for specific payment methods?
payments.answer: Occasionally—check current promotions for eligible methods.

payments.question: Can I use a personal check or money order for payment?
payments.answer: We generally don’t accept checks or money orders for online orders.

payments.question: Can I use a foreign currency for payment?
payments.answer: Orders are charged in the store’s billing currency; currency conversion depends on your bank.

payments.question: How can I contact customer support for payment-related inquiries?
payments.answer: Use in-app support, email, or live chat for billing questions.

payments.question: Are my personal and payment details secure?
payments.answer: Yes—we protect personal/payment info with industry-standard security and encryption.

contact_and_support.question: What is your contact information (phone number, email address, etc.)?
contact_and_support.answer: See our Contact page for the most up-to-date phone/email details.

contact_and_support.question: How can I reach your customer support team?
contact_and_support.answer: Use live chat, email, or in-app Help Center during support hours.

contact_and_support.question: What are your customer support hours?
contact_and_support.answer: Support hours are listed on the Contact page and site footer.

contact_and_support.question: Do you have a live chat option for immediate assistance?
contact_and_support.answer: Yes—live chat is available during business hours via the chat icon.

contact_and_support.question: Can I contact you through social media platforms?
contact_and_support.answer: Yes—message us via our official social profiles.

contact_and_support.question: Is there a specific contact form on your website?
contact_and_support.answer: Yes—use the Contact form for structured inquiries.

contact_and_support.question: Can I request a callback from customer support?
contact_and_support.answer: Callback requests may be available—submit your number and preferred time.

contact_and_support.question: How long does it take to receive a response to my inquiry?
contact_and_support.answer: We aim to respond within 1–2 business days, often sooner.

contact_and_support.question: Can I schedule a phone call or appointment with a representative?
contact_and_support.answer: Yes—share your availability and topic via the Contact form.

contact_and_support.question: Are there different contact numbers or emails for specific departments?
contact_and_support.answer: Department contacts may be listed on the Contact page.

contact_and_support.question: Is there a specific email address for technical support?
contact_and_support.answer: Yes—see the Contact page for the tech support email.

contact_and_support.question: Is there a specific department or contact for product inquiries?
contact_and_support.answer: Product inquiries can be sent via product page forms or the sales email.

contact_and_support.question: Can I request assistance in a language other than English?
contact_and_support.answer: Language support varies by availability—ask and we’ll do our best.

contact_and_support.question: How can I unsubscribe from your mailing list or opt-out of communications?
contact_and_support.answer: Use the unsubscribe link in emails or update preferences in your account.

contact_and_support.question: Can I sign up for a newsletter or email subscription for updates and offers?
contact_and_support.answer: Yes—subscribe via the footer or account settings.

contact_and_support.question: Can I provide feedback or make a complaint through your contact information?
contact_and_support.answer: Yes—send feedback via email, chat, or the Contact form.

contact_and_support.question: Can I visit your physical store or office location?
contact_and_support.answer: Visit details and hours are listed on our Locations page.

contact_and_support.question: Do you offer live chat support?
contact_and_support.answer: Yes—live chat is available on our website during business hours.

account_and_orders.question: How can I create an account?
account_and_orders.answer: Click 'Sign Up' and follow the steps to create your account.

account_and_orders.question: Can I order without creating an account?
account_and_orders.answer: Yes—guest checkout may be available. Creating an account enables tracking and faster checkout.

account_and_orders.question: Can I cancel my order?
account_and_orders.answer: You can cancel free of charge as long as the status is not yet 'Printing'. Go to My Orders > select order > Cancel Order.

account_and_orders.question: Can I change or cancel an item in my order?
account_and_orders.answer: Edits aren’t supported after placing the order. Cancel and place a new order with the updated details.

account_and_orders.question: Can I order by phone?
account_and_orders.answer: Please place orders through the app or website.

account_and_orders.question: Can I add a gift message to my order?
account_and_orders.answer: Add a gift message during checkout if the option is available.

account_and_orders.question: Do you offer gift wrapping services?
account_and_orders.answer: Gift wrapping may be available for an additional fee when offered at checkout.

account_and_orders.question: Can I order a product as a gift?
account_and_orders.answer: Yes—enter the recipient’s shipping address at checkout.

account_and_orders.question: What should I do if I receive the wrong item?
account_and_orders.answer: Use the in-app Help Center > Customer Support to submit a ticket; we’ll assist with a replacement.

account_and_orders.question: What should I do if my discount code is not working?
account_and_orders.answer: Check validity/terms and entry. If it still fails, contact support.

account_and_orders.question: Can I use multiple promo codes on a single order?
account_and_orders.answer: Usually only one promo code can be applied per order.

account_and_orders.question: Do you have a loyalty program?
account_and_orders.answer: You may earn points on purchases and redeem them for discounts when loyalty is available.

account_and_orders.question: What is your price matching policy?
account_and_orders.answer: We may match the price of identical items from eligible competitors—contact support with the link.

account_and_orders.question: What is your price adjustment policy?
account_and_orders.answer: If an item you bought goes on sale within a short period, contact us once for a potential price adjustment per policy.

account_and_orders.question: Can I request an invoice for my order?
account_and_orders.answer: An invoice is provided with your order; contact support if you need another copy or VAT invoice.

account_and_orders.question: What is your email newsletter about?
account_and_orders.answer: We share new releases, offers, and helpful tips—subscribe on our site.

account_and_orders.question: Can I change my shipping address after placing an order?
account_and_orders.answer: If not shipped yet, contact support ASAP and we’ll try to update it.

account_and_orders.question: Can I order a product that is out of stock?
account_and_orders.answer: Use the 'Notify me' option for restock alerts; some items may allow backorder/pre-order.

account_and_orders.question: Can I request a product that is listed as 'limited edition' to be restocked?
account_and_orders.answer: Limited editions may not be restocked once sold out.

account_and_orders.question: Can I order a product that is discontinued?
account_and_orders.answer: Discontinued items aren’t available; consider similar alternatives.

account_and_orders.question: How do I view my order history?
account_and_orders.answer: Open My Orders under My Account to view past orders and details.

account_and_orders.question: Is my data secure?
account_and_orders.answer: Yes—WandDo uses industry-standard security practices to protect your information.

account_and_orders.question: How do I delete my account?
account_and_orders.answer: In the app: Profile (under My Account) > Delete Account. Follow on-screen steps to permanently delete. If you’re facing issues, contact support—we’d love to help.

account_and_orders.question: How do I reset my password?
account_and_orders.answer: On the Sign In screen, tap 'Forgot Password', enter your email, and use the verification code to reset it securely.
